name: mern-mindpad
description: MindPad is a full-stack note-taking application built with the **MERN stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). It lets users create, read, update, and delete notes with a clean, responsive UI powered by **Tailwind CSS** and **DaisyUI**. The app also includes **rate limiting** via Upstash Redis and toast notifications for better UX.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
